entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
